name: Smartphone slip red/pink
description:
Zunanja dimenzija: 16cm x 9,5cm 
primerni za telefone dimenzij 14cm x 7,5cm in manjše

--------------------------------------------------------------

Size: 16cm x 9,5cm 
Suitable for mobile phones in size 14cm x 7,5cm or smaller

Žepek je izdelan iz 100% volnenega filca. Telefon pospravimo skozi zgornjo odprtino, v spodnjem žepku pa je prostor za kartice in bankovce.

name: Bag brown flower
description:
bag // torba, 32cm x 25cm 

Znotraj ima torbica žep s tremi prekati, iz notranje strani se zgoraj zapne z magnetno sponko.

Na eni strani je okrašena z raznobarvnimi rožami ali metulji.

name: Shoe clips (1 pair)
description:
This shoe clips are made of soft leather and are availabe in different colors.
They can be adjusted on shoes with small metallic clips. 

When you get bored with them or the clips don't suit your outfit you can take them off and apply them to another pair of your shoes.

name: Butterfly pin
description:
Butterfly pins are available in 9 different colour combinations.
Size: 8 cm

When ordering, select the number listed next to the pin in your favourite colour combination
---------------------------

Broške Metulji so na voljo v 9 različnih barvnih kombinacijah.
Velikost premera je 8 cm.

Ob naročilu označite številko, ki je ob vaši izbrani barvni kombinaciji rožice.

name: Double Flower Pin // Broška Dvojna rožica
description:
Double Flower pins are available in 9 different colour combinations. 
Size: 6 cm 

When ordering, select the number listed next to the pin in your favourite colour combination
---------------------------

Broške Dvojna rožica so na voljo v 9 različnih barvnih kombinacijah. 
Velikost premera je 6 cm.

Ob naročilu označite številko, ki je ob vaši izbrani barvni kombinaciji rožice.

name: Triple Flower Pin // Broška Trojna rožica
description:
Triple flower pins are available in 9 different colour combinations. 
Size: 7cm 

When ordering, select the number listed next to the pin in your favourite colour combination
---------------------------

Broške Trojna rožica so na voljo v 9 različnih barvnih kombinacijah. 
Velikost premera je 7cm.

Ob naročilu označite številko, ki je ob vaši izbrani barvni kombinaciji rožice.

name: Brooches 3D - Sharp // 3D broške - Oglate
description:
Made of thin 100% wool felt. 
Brooches are available in different colours and 2 different shapes. 
Size: 7cm
------------------------------------
Broške so na voljo v različnih barvah in 2 različnih oblikah.
Narejene so iz 100% tankega volnenega filca
Velikost: 7cm.

name: Brooches 3D - Round // 3D broške - Okrogle
description:
Made of thin 100% wool felt. 
Brooches are available in different colours and 2 different shapes. 
Size: 7cm
------------------------------------
Broške so na voljo v različnih barvah in 2 različnih oblikah.
Narejene so iz 100% tankega volnenega filca
Velikost: 7cm.

name: Head band round flower / Obroč za lase okrogla roža
description:
Kovinski obroč krasi roža iz volnenega filca. 
Rožo lahko premikate po obroču, lahko jo tudi snamete. 
Konca obroča sta malce zavihana navzven in zaščitena s trakom, da nas ne bi žulil za ušesi. Če je obroč pretesen ga lahko brez težav in strahu, da bi se zlomil, upognete in si ga prilagodite.
Roža je velika 7cm

name: Head band big flower / Obroč za lase velika roža
description:
Kovinski obroč krasi roža iz volnenega filca. Rožo lahko premikate po obroču, lahko jo tudi snamete. 
Konca obroča sta malce zavihana navzven in zaščitena s trakom, da nas ne bi žulil za ušesi. Če je obroč pretesen ga lahko brez težav in strahu, da bi se zlomil, upognete in si ga prilagodite.
roža je velika 11cm

name: Dotty Red
description: Preberi v slovenščini MATERIALS Sole: felt and rubber Exterior: cotton heavy fabric or microfiber DESCRIPTION The most comfortable ballerina shoes are perfect to wear for dry and warm weather strolls, running around the office or school corridors as well as in the house. Since wool is a natural isolator, it regulates your body temperature. Wool felt soles are breathable so your feet won't 'burn' when wearing these shoes without socks. Shoes can be washed in a washing machine at 30°C (wool programme!) using a very gentle soap for wool.

name: Ballerina Slippers Yellow
description: Preberi v slovenščini ------------------------------ Isn't it nice to feel comfortable and look good at the same time? Especially after a hard day at work when you take off your tight high heeled shoes and slip your tired feet into cosy, but still elegant slippers? Or after a nice hot bath when your feet deserve some extra warmth and prolonged comfort? These elegant slippers are handmade of 100% wool felt with a non-slip sole. They are light, soft and extremely comfortable to wear throughout the year. After a few days, the felt shapes nicely around the foot making the already cosy slipper fit perfectly to your foot. A 4 mm heel is added to a non-slip sole to make it even more comfortable. Available sizes: EU sizes (US sizes): 36/37 (5/6), 37/38 (6/7), 38/39 (8/9), 39/40 (8/9) Felt ballerinas will stretch for half a size. If you have a rather wide foot I'd advise you to consider one size bigger as your usual shoe size.

name: G white red dot
description:
Preberi v slovenščini *****************
The best footwear for our kids simulate barefoot conditions. But since we cannot walk around barefoot all the time, the next best thing is wearing Ursanina slippers.

Ursanina baby slippers are made of 100% wool felt. Due to unique characteristics of wool, Ursanina’s slippers are soft, light, breathable and extremely comfortable to wear throughout the year and can be worn with or without socks. Slippers for toddlers and kids have non slip soles.

May your kids enjoy comfort of movement in Ursanina slippers!

Ursanina baby slippers are made of 100% wool felt. Due to unique characteristics of wool, Ursanina’s slippers are soft, light, breathable and extremely comfortable to wear throughout the year and can be worn with or without socks. Slippers for toddlers and kids have non slip soles.

May your kids enjoy comfort of movement in Ursanina slippers!

name: Pink Green 3D
description: Preberi v slovenščini ------------------------------ Isn't it nice to feel comfortable and look good at the same time? Especially after a hard day at work when you take off your tight high heeled shoes and slip your tired feet into lovely cosy slippers? Or after a nice hot bath when your feet deserve some extra warmth and prolonged comfort? These colourful slippers are handmade of 100% wool felt with a non-slip sole. They are light, soft and extremely comfortable to wear throughout the year. After a few days, the felt shapes nicely around the foot making the already cosy slipper fit perfectly to your foot. Available sizes: EU sizes (US sizes): 36 (5), 37-38 (6-7), 39 (8), 40-41 (9-10), 42 (11) If you have a rather wide foot I'd advise you to consider one size bigger as your usual shoe size.
